meanings.definition: The act or process of forming a mental image or vision.
meanings.sent1: Her visualization of the beach was so clear, she could almost feel the sand between her toes.
meanings.sent2: The artist's visualization of the sunset was breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: His visualization of winning the lottery made him smile.
meanings.sent4: The visualization of success fueled her determination.
meanings.sent5: The visualization of the monster under the bed made him scared to sleep.

meanings.definition: The representation of data or information in a visual format.
meanings.sent1: The visualization of the sales data helped the team understand their progress.
meanings.sent2: The infographic provided a clear visualization of the statistics.
meanings.sent3: The visualization of the budget as a pie chart made everyone crave dessert.
meanings.sent4: The visualization of the timeline as a road map guided their project.
meanings.sent5: The visualization of the concept as a puzzle piece fit perfectly into the presentation.
